entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Charlottetown
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:15 PM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Charlottetown Airport 3:00 PM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 0.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 43 %
Dewpoint: -10.2°C
Wind: ESE 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning early this evening. Amount 15 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023
